text: @realDonaldTrump Yes swamp monster. “Testing is overrated# Why are u getting tested everyday? you can’t gaslight Testing needs ramped up for the all of us. You r failure of leadership. Get a logistician to get on ordering for the nation. Kushner needs to go to way side.  Enough nepotism #COVID19
